name: Itamar Medical Ltd.
description: Itamar Medical Ltd. is a medical technology company focused on the development and commercialization of innovative solutions for the diagnosis and management of sleep apnea and other related disorders. Founded in 1997, the company is headquartered in Caesarea, Israel, and is dedicated to improving patient outcomes through non-invasive diagnostic technologies. Itamar's flagship product, the WatchPAT, is a revolutionary device that enables home sleep apnea testing, providing accurate assessments of patients' breathing patterns during sleep. This technology enhances the convenience of sleep studies by allowing patients to undergo testing in the comfort of their homes, thus increasing compliance and improving the quality of data collected. The company is also committed to expanding its product portfolio and has ongoing research and development efforts aimed at addressing various cardiopulmonary conditions. Itamar Medical is at the forefront of transforming the sleep medicine field, leveraging advanced technology to deliver effective diagnostic solutions. As the global prevalence of sleep apnea rises, Itamar is well-positioned to meet the growing demand for efficient and patient-friendly diagnostic tools, ultimately contributing to better health management.
